name: Monochrome Heights (Black and White Jam #8↷∞)
description:
After escaping from Dr. Honey’s lab, Happy the Robot discovered the joy of music. Happy wants nothing more than to listen to a record on their headphones and enjoy life, but sometimes the world has other plans. There is no future without radical change, justice, deft adaptation, and good music. Help Happy get their music back!

CREDITS
Eber Alegria
Bent Neatly
Patrick Knisely aka Pdyx

If you enjoyed the game and want to see more of Happy, please let us know!
